title: classic resteasy-client: ensure sub-resources are also proxied
body:
### Describe the bug

resteasy [resteasy-microprofile](https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-microprofile) "recently" applied a bugfix that makes sure, that sub-resources to a microprofile client are also proxied properly.

* their bug report -> https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-microprofile/issues/239
* their pr -> https://github.com/resteasy/resteasy-microprofile/pull/241

Given that in `quarkus-rest-client` the class `QuarkusProxyInvocationHandler`  duplicates their `ProxyInvocationHandler` and `QuarkusRestClientBuilder` duplicates their `RestClientBuilderImpl` ... both should be updated accordingly.

### Expected behavior

sub-resources are properly proxied, like they are with resteasy's microprofile client implementation.

### Actual behavior

sub-resources aren't proxied.
